p: To assess the predictive capacity of the models, model predictions were compared with real observations (occurrences and pseudo‐absences) using the area under the curve (AUC) of a receiver‐operating characteristics plot (Fielding & Bell, 1997; Swets, 1988). This AUC measure allows us to test whether the obtained predictions differ significantly from a random prediction. As a rough guideline, models with AUC values below 0.7 were too poor to be considered in further analyses (Phillips & Dudík, 2008).
